comment: nice product, camera, RAm performance was good so far, delivery also really excited me because delivered product on 4th day, much appreciated.

Nice phone, working flawlessly, lot of apps has been installed by me but phone is showing some great ram management and facing no lgs while playing PUBG.. Camera quality is excellent in this price tag, cant expect more from Xiaomi.. Used realme devices also and i faced a lot of bugs in realme software, ads are ok for me in miui than facing bugs in colour os. Delivery is ontime with good packing by amazon.. Build quality of phone is good. Look wise its premium. Camerabump is more than i thought of. Highly recommended device in this price tag.
May be the best in the price range

Have used for over a month now , it definitely is an improvement over the previous versions, especially the camera. The battery life is decent although could be better but it is backed up by fast charger so charging time has certainly reduced. The Ram and internal.storage as well are higher than what other competitors are offering for a product at this price point. Certainly good value for money.

So far so good. Best phone in comparison to Lenovo K8Note and other at par mobiles. 48 megapixel camera and UI graphics, Ram and storage is quite sufficient to operate Pubg as well as multiple apps simultaneously

I bought this phone on 23rd july,2020.Within 3 weeks, this vertical line has appeared on screen...and phone is running without touching.. I want to know what's the issue with this device..if anyone can help..let me know.
No issue, good price, redme mobile is my favorite because it's long lasting phone then other, Sim slot remover missing....
Picture quality is superb. No any issues so far.
